ygData.subject: Low 20s Blues Was: staff of observers
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the same problems as you with levels in the low 20s Hard to get groups for Evil Eyes, Najena, Wooly Mammoths, and Permafrost Aviaks are way camped.
ygData.messageBody:
I had the same problems as you with levels in the low 20s

Hard to get groups for Evil Eyes, Najena, Wooly Mammoths, and Permafrost
Aviaks are way camped.
Treants kill faction and you have to wait in line

My eventual solution an it promises to be good as so far is has taken me
from 21-almost 24 is Mistmoore. Dangerous place and the trains make Unrest
seem like an evening stroll in Qeynos Hills, but the exp is awesome, loot
decent, and the people all seem to know each other there and there are no
shortages of group positions.

Glom Fyrestormm
23rd Gnome Wizard
Prexus

----- Original Message -----
From: PHAEDRA WHITLOCK <PWHITLOCK@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 9:42 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] staff of observers


> From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
> Im here. Fighting my way out of Lvl 21. Or trying to... So few good places
to hunt, so few people to group with. *sighs*
>
> Piecemealing it is taking awhile. Spent a morning camping Emperor Crush
and Dvinn, afternon at the Gorge slaying Eyes, Evening Aviaks. So boring,
and this stuff will be green at 22 I suspect (well, not the aviaks, but
those are Soooooo camped).
>
> Im on 3 wizard lists, cant tell them apart honestly.
>
> Shannyn
>
>
>
>
> >>> Bob <vampyre@...> 11/29/99 06:05PM >>>
> From: Bob <vampyre@...>
>
> I was also wondering where everyon went. Maybe the are all still in
turkey
> stupor. Tonight I will try again for the Inferno Goblin Wizard's heart.
> Then my first big quest will be compleated.
>
> >
